definition: root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

sentences.english: Rhizomes consistently short necked, culms always forming a single clump.
sentences.chinese: 一贯的根状茎短颈，秆总是形成一片单个的丛。

sentences.english: The primordial meristem at the tip of rhizome is surrounded by 3-5 lepises.
sentences.chinese: 根状茎顶端的原分生组织由3～5个鳞片包被。

sentences.english: The yield and diosgenin content of underground stem were different in different plants.
sentences.chinese: 不同单株根状茎产量和皂素含量不同。

sentences.english: The rhizomes are rich in the alkaloid colchicine.
sentences.chinese: 根状茎富有生物碱秋水仙素。

sentences.english: Cd treatments affected the quality of lotus root significantly.
sentences.chinese: 重金属镉处理影响了莲藕根状茎的产量。

sentences.english: Lily of the valley is root shape bine procumbent provide ramose.
sentences.chinese: 铃兰为根状茎匍匐并具分枝。

sentences.english: When monthly mean temperature is 5~10℃, buds and rhizoma stop growing and overwinter.
sentences.chinese: 月均温5～10℃时，根状茎和芽停止生长进入冬眠。

sentences.english: Herbs perennial, usually with a conspicuous rhizome.
sentences.chinese: 一年生草本，没有一根状茎。
